      Constructor for a Stock scraper

      Throws:

  • Method Details

    • getStockInfo

      public String[] getStockInfo​(String stockTicker)
      Searches the HTML code of site sent as constructor parameter and returns information about the Stock
      Parameters:
      stockTicker - Short (often 3 letter) code used to identify Stocks on the international market
      Returns:
      A string array containing stock title, stock code, price,
      See Also:
      StockScraper(String url)

    • getStockReturn

      public Double getStockReturn​(String stockTicker, int stockPrice, int numberOfStocks)
      Searches the HTML code of site sent as constructor parameter and returns information about the Stock
      Parameters:
      stockPrice - The price of the stock at the time of purchase
      numberOfStocks - The number of stocks you wish to gague the return
      Returns:
      Double value of the change in stock price of the given stock
      See Also:
      StockScraper(String url)

    • getStockReturnPrcent

      public Double getStockReturnPrcent​(String stockTicker, int stockPrice, int numberOfStocks)
      Searches the HTML code of site sent as constructor parameter and returns information about the Stock
      Returns:
      Double value of the precentile change in stock price of the given stock
      See Also:
      StockScraper(String url)
